name: The Maze Of The Periodic Scale
name_original: The Maze Of The Periodic Scale
description:
Made In Construct 3
This is a game where you must find the 12 atoms called Zinnielium and forge it to finish the game. There are enemies and even exploding enemies (the gold ones). To collect the Zinnielium and other resources, you must destroy some grass or kill some enemies. It is recommended to click shift when the game starts to keep track of your progress.
